https://aryion.com/g4/user/Papipo

Some information:

1. You can blacklist uploaders who mainly upload stuff you don't like (in settings)
2. Tags can be watched, hidden and assigned weights (https://ehwiki.org/wiki/My_Tags)
3. Some tags should give you an warning before opening, unless you disabled it. (delete the nw cookie to enable it again)
